channel.title: (New Class: Mistress (Offensive)
channel.description:
Mistress is a new class I was thinking of to add to the game. It will be under the unknown category. She will be of same faction as the king himself. Mistresses are immune to conversion
**Passive** Royal Honor: Can't be order-executed by the king
King's Love: Immune to Occupation and Target Changing and Conversion
**Day Abilities** Future Ruler: Gives the prince immunity to death for that night. If you're a cult/unseen mistress, you'll give the mastermind a investigation-cloak, and give the cult leader night immunity and investigation-cloak (2 Uses)
**Night Abilities** Affair: Visit a player and find out their faction. If they're other faction than your faction, you'll kill them. (Doesn't bypass night immunity) (2 Uses)
Luck of the Draw: Visit a player and disable their ability to step up as king if they're of a royal blood. If they don't have the royal blood passive, you'll disable their ability to use their day abilities. This ability ignores a player's faction, so that means if the target is of the same faction of you and you disable their ability to step up, they can't get confirmed. (Infinite Uses)
EDIT:
**Notifications**
_Future Ruler_ You gave the prince immunity to death tonight! (Good Mistress) You will make the Mastermind appear non-suspicious tonight! (Unseen Mistress) You gave the Cult Leader immunity to death and appear non-suspicious tonight!
_Affair_ They were a (BD/Neutral Class), so you killed them! (Evil Mistress) They were a (Unseen/Cult Class), so you killed them! (Good Mistress) They were a (Unseen/Cult Class), so you won't kill them! (Evil Mistress) They were a (BD/Neutral Class), so you won't kill them! (Good Mistress) _Death Immune Target_ They were a (opposite faction class), so you killed them! They was immune to your attack!
_Luck of the Draw_ (Target) was a royal blood member! You disabled their ability to step up as king! (Royal Passive) (Target) wasn't of the royal blood, so you disabled their day abilities instead!
If you have any ideas and change suggestions. Please feel free to comment
